articles.description: From dining experiences based on "Star Wars" and Marvel superheroes to a waterslide, the Disney Wish cruise ship is filled with unique experiences.
articles.content:
The Disney Wish will be the fifth ship to join the Disney fleet, with sailing expected to begin in summer 2022.
USA TODAY
